message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, and I'm confident it can benefit your business. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a price I believe is fair, considering the product's potential. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss it further.  If you're not, I'm happy to move on to other interested parties.
